# Fiendish Quickening (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 full round

**Components:** V, S, Fiend

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** Caster

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 95

For the duration of this spell, the casterâ€™s *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* or *[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|greater teleport]]* spell-like ability is quickened. This means that the caster can teleport as a free action and still have time during the round to attack and/or move. The caster can use his quickened *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* or *[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|greater teleport]]* once per round. This spell does not affect *teleport* spells in any way, only the spell-like ability of fiends to teleport themselves.
